content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's start with the price. I'm looking for the highest possible amount. Please make your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because attempting an extremely high opening bid goes against my goal to secure the lowest price possible. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
